Html:
Hi Radioman

I need something like the „Get Static“ functionality in your Forms example. But I don’t have a Map-Control on an Form, because I want to use the image in a "Paper-Report" as an image. I just have the coordinates and the zoom level. What can I use instead of "area = Main.MainMap.GetRectOfAllRoutes(null);" or "area = Main.MainMap.SelectedArea;" to get the area? Do you have any suggestions?

 Thanks in advance

 Andreas

Hi Radioman

Thanks for your quick response.

But I’ve some problems interpreting it. I’ve coordinates and a zoom level but no possibility to place the Map-Control because I’dont have a form. I need a image-file with the picture the Map-Control would display.
GetLatLngFromGeocoder gives me a PointLatLng back but i need RectLatLng for the given coordinates and a zoom level. Is there a Method for that?

Thanks

Andreas
